snippet: The publisher of The Journal News, in Westchester County, N.Y., said the move was made in response to recently passed legislation that limited access to previously public information.
abstract: Journal News in Westchester County, NY, removes interactive online map of local handgun permit holders that drew nationwide anger and prompted threats against newspaper's staff; decision to withdraw map comes in response to passage of sweeping gun legislation in New York State that includes provision prohibiting the release of information on gun permit holders for 120 days.
lead_paragraph: The publisher of The Journal News, in Westchester County, N.Y., said the move was made in response to recently passed legislation that limited access to previously public information.

headline.seo: Journal News Takes Down Gun Permit Map
headline.main: Newspaper Takes Down Map of Gun Permit Holders
headline.print_headline: Newspaper Takes Down Map Listing Gun Permits
